Posts.Content: I'm 34.. n found breast lumps around my nipple that feel like small peas .. The first time I noticed was in February of this year n just had a mammogram and ultra sound. The breast lady said that the radiologist wanted me ta get a biopsy and said I have pleophoric breast calcifications and I'm at bra 1.. n bi- rad catagory 5... anyone know what this means.. I'm 2 or ride n scared n I'm having my bi-RAD in a hour.... idk if my childhood leukemia that I had when I was 8 is a cause
Posts.Title: pleophoric breast calcifications... bi-RAD catagory 5 wat does this mean?
